markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Devil Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1389) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 41 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Hellspawn](/Feats.aspx?ID=1381)

</column>

---

Drawing on the infernal power of your sinister forbears, you mislead your foes with magical deception. You can cast [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) and [_misdirection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=198) each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
name: Devil Magic
